Package io.servicetalk.http.api

Class HttpSerializers

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.servicetalk.http.api.HttpSerializers
  • public final class HttpSerializers
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for creation of HttpSerializerDeserializer and HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      • appSerializerUtf8FixLen

        public static HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer<java.lang.String> appSerializerUtf8FixLen()
        Creates a HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that serializes Strings with StandardCharsets.UTF_8 encoding using fixed int length delimited framing. The framing is required so the same String objects can be deserialized by the peer, otherwise the boundaries aren't known. If the desire is to serialize raw data contained in the String, see stringStreamingSerializer(Charset, Consumer). The HttpHeaderNames.CONTENT_TYPE value prefix is "application/text-fix-int".
        Returns:
        a HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that serializes Strings with StandardCharsets.UTF_8 encoding using fixed int length delimited framing.
        See Also:
        FixedLengthStreamingSerializer

      • appSerializerUtf8VarLen

        public static HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer<java.lang.String> appSerializerUtf8VarLen()
        Creates a HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that serializes Strings with StandardCharsets.UTF_8 encoding using variable int length delimited framing. The framing is required so the same String objects can be deserialized by the peer, otherwise the boundaries aren't known. If the desire is to serialize raw data contained in the String, see stringStreamingSerializer(Charset, Consumer).The HttpHeaderNames.CONTENT_TYPE value prefix is "application/text-var-int".
        Returns:
        a HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that serializes Strings with StandardCharsets.UTF_8 encoding using variable int length delimited framing.
        See Also:
        VarIntLengthStreamingSerializer

      • appSerializerFixLen

        public static HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer<java.lang.String> appSerializerFixLen​(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Creates a HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that serializes Strings with charset encoding using fixed int length delimited framing. The framing is required so the same String objects can be deserialized by the peer, otherwise the boundaries aren't known. If the desire is to serialize raw data contained in the String, see stringStreamingSerializer(Charset, Consumer). The HttpHeaderNames.CONTENT_TYPE value prefix is "application/text-fix-int".
        Parameters:
        charset - The character encoding to use for serialization.
        Returns:
        a HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that serializes Strings with charset encoding using fixed int length delimited framing.
        See Also:
        FixedLengthStreamingSerializer

      • appSerializerVarLen

        public static HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer<java.lang.String> appSerializerVarLen​(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Creates a HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that serializes Strings with charset encoding using fixed int length delimited framing. The framing is required so the same String objects can be deserialized by the peer, otherwise the boundaries aren't known. If the desire is to serialize raw data contained in the String, see stringStreamingSerializer(Charset, Consumer). The HttpHeaderNames.CONTENT_TYPE value prefix is "application/text-var-int".

        See Also:
        VarIntLengthStreamingSerializer

      • stringStreamingSerializer

        public static HttpStreamingSerializer<java.lang.String> stringStreamingSerializer​(java.nio.charset.Charset charset,
                                                                                  java.util.function.Consumer<HttpHeaders> headersSerializeConsumer)
        Create a HttpStreamingSerializer that serializes String. This method is useful if the payload body is provided in String and the HttpHeaderNames.CONTENT_TYPE is known a-prior (e.g. streaming raw json data from a stream of Strings). Deserialization should be done using the a-prior knowledge to use a compatible HttpStreamingDeserializer.
        Parameters:
        charset - The character encoding to use for serialization.
        headersSerializeConsumer - Sets the headers to indicate the appropriate encoding and content type.
        Returns:
        a HttpStreamingSerializer that uses a Serializer for serialization.

      • bytesStreamingSerializer

        public static HttpStreamingSerializer<byte[]> bytesStreamingSerializer​(java.util.function.Consumer<HttpHeaders> headersSerializeConsumer)
        Create a HttpStreamingSerializer that serializes byte[]. This method is useful if the payload body is provided in byte[] and the HttpHeaderNames.CONTENT_TYPE is known a-prior (e.g. streaming raw json data from a stream of byte[]s). Deserialization should be done using the a-prior knowledge to use a compatible HttpStreamingDeserializer.
        Parameters:
        headersSerializeConsumer - Sets the headers to indicate the appropriate encoding and content type.
        Returns:
        a HttpStreamingSerializer that uses a Serializer for serialization.

      • jsonSerializer

        public static <T> HttpSerializerDeserializer<T> jsonSerializer​(SerializerDeserializer<T> serializer)
        Creates an HttpSerializerDeserializer that targets HttpHeaderValues.APPLICATION_JSON.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of object to serialize.
        Parameters:
        serializer - Used to serialize each HttpSerializers.
        Returns:
        HttpSerializerDeserializer that targets HttpHeaderValues.APPLICATION_JSON.

      • serializer

        public static <T> HttpSerializerDeserializer<T> serializer​(SerializerDeserializer<T> serializer,
                                                           java.util.function.Consumer<HttpHeaders> headersSerializeConsumer,
                                                           java.util.function.Predicate<HttpHeaders> headersDeserializePredicate)
        Creates an HttpSerializerDeserializer that uses SerializerDeserializer for serialization.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of object to serialize.
        Parameters:
        serializer - Used to serialize each HttpSerializers.
        headersSerializeConsumer - Sets the headers to indicate the appropriate encoding and content type.
        headersDeserializePredicate - Validates the headers are of the supported encoding and content type.
        Returns:
        HttpSerializerDeserializer that uses a SerializerDeserializer for serialization.

      • streamingSerializer

        public static <T> HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer<T> streamingSerializer​(StreamingSerializerDeserializer<T> serializer,
                                                                             java.util.function.Consumer<HttpHeaders> headersSerializeConsumer,
                                                                             java.util.function.Predicate<HttpHeaders> headersDeserializePredicate)
        Creates an HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that uses StreamingSerializerDeserializer for serialization.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of object to serialize.
        Parameters:
        serializer - Used to serialize each HttpSerializers.
        headersSerializeConsumer - Sets the headers to indicate the appropriate encoding and content type.
        headersDeserializePredicate - Validates the headers are of the supported encoding and content type.
        Returns:
        HttpStreamingSerializerDeserializer that uses a StreamingSerializerDeserializer for serialization.

      • streamingSerializer

        public static <T> HttpStreamingSerializer<T> streamingSerializer​(Serializer<T> serializer,
                                                                 java.util.function.ToIntFunction<T> bytesEstimator,
                                                                 java.util.function.Consumer<HttpHeaders> headersSerializeConsumer)
        Create a HttpStreamingSerializer that uses a Serializer for serialization. This method is useful if the payload body is provided in non-Buffer type and the HttpHeaderNames.CONTENT_TYPE is known a-prior (e.g. streaming raw json data from a stream of Strings). Deserialization should be done using the a-prior knowledge to use a compatible HttpStreamingDeserializer.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of object to serialize.
        Parameters:
        serializer - Used to serialize each HttpSerializers chunk.
        bytesEstimator - Provides an estimate of how many bytes to allocate for each Buffer to serialize to.
        headersSerializeConsumer - Sets the headers to indicate the appropriate encoding and content type.
        Returns:
        a HttpStreamingSerializer that uses a Serializer for serialization.
